column4: any idea about this error ? (<unknown>:5249): Gtk-WARNING **: Locale not supported by C library.
What do your LC_ALL, LOCALE, and/or LANG environment variables say?
I saw this site but it dosen't work,
I don't know how to give you the information
it might help you to know that i'm trying to make pcsx works with FFVII
Do you have a default locale set?
When you ran "dpkg-reconfigure locales", what did it say after "Generating locales..."?
but mainly every en and fr
If you run "dpkg-reconfigure localeconf" as root, what is the currently selected locale?
Was the "manage locales with debconf" checked?
My suggestion is to set the default locale using "dpkg-reconfigure localeconf" (ensuring that the "Manage locales with debconf" checkbox is checked), and then log out/log back in.
